    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int AgentMove.chooseNextNode​(CL_Agent Agent, game_service game)
    This function checks if a route has already been set for the agent and then sends the agent to the next node.
    int Pokemon_Game.chooseNextNode​(CL_Agent Agent, game_service game)
    This function checks if a route has already been set for the agent and then sends the agent to the next node.
    void Pokemon_Game.moveAgants​(game_service game)
    This function moves all our agents to their next destination by the move function- move function:this function returns a string that contains all the new information of the graph: where each agent should be located, In addition, it creates new Pokemon in new locations in case agents catch them.
    void Pokemon_Game.PokemonUpdate​(game_service game)
    Updated list of all the Pokemon we haven't caught yet And sorts them by their score from the big to the small score.
    void Pokemon_Game.putAgents​(game_service game)
    This function is used by us for the beginning of the game: it allows the agents to be placed on the graph.
    void Pokemon_Game.PutOnBoard​(game_service game)
    This function updates the board in the graph of the current phase, and places the Pokemon on the same graph and sent to the putAgents function to place the agents on the graph.
